channel.title: Rsps starter mode
channel.description:
[b]been searching around for a tut on how to add starter modes for example: range pure magic and so on..
does anyone know how i can add this? [/b]

item.title: Rsps starter mode
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“haviland4, post:6, topic:551415”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=670330.msg4482490#msg4482490 date=1431196269]
So just ignore my reply. kk.
[/quote]

no it’s helpful but i would kinda need a tut to folow or some help?[/quote]
What I told you was rather direct… If you don’t understand something I said, it helps for you to say that… and it kinda helps if you tell me what you didn’t understand.

Section Rules [READ OR GET PUNISHED] Last Updated: 7/23/11

3. We are not a Spoonfeeding community. We do not teach in an oversimplified manner to discourage independent thought. We encourage independent thought, meaning you must help yourselves before requesting help. Failure to provide some sort of prior knowledge or work to the problem will result in a lock of the topic. This is final.

All you keep doing is basically saying “idk how to do it, give me copy pasta to do it for me”… And that’s against the rules^

Read full topic

@Welliton_inc wrote:

It is pretty straight forward. As you said you couldn’t find a tutorial, so this is the best help you’ll get man. Just follow what we said and you should be able to add it into your server.

item.title: Rsps starter mode
item.dc:creator: @haviland4 haviland4
item.description:
@haviland4 wrote:

[quote=“Welliton_inc, post:2, topic:551415”]What base are you using?

You could implement an interface or a frame which you can select which starter mode you want. Then depending in which mode was chosen, add an if statement with the items you want that player to recieve per mode.[/quote]

Deathlypvpz v4 mate

Read full topic

item.title: Rsps starter mode
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

It’s simple.

You know that method “addStarter” literally every PI has? Yeah… Use that.

Create a variable (probably an int) to be stored in the player class. When a new character logs in, have them pick a starter (Create a dialogue in the dialogue handler) from a dialogue. When they do, change that variable to 1, 2, 3 whatever.

In the addStarter method, add a switch statement (There are many ways to do this, I just say switch because it seems it’d be the best) for the variable.

Then populate each case with items…

Read full topic

item.title: Rsps starter mode
item.dc:creator: @Welliton_inc Welliton_inc
item.description:
@Welliton_inc wrote:

What base are you using?

You could implement an interface or a frame which you can select which starter mode you want. Then depending in which mode was chosen, add an if statement with the items you want that player to recieve per mode.

Read full topic
